extension.name: Event Calendar - Joinery "manyCalendars" fork
extension.comments: Show CiviCRM Event in Calendar. This code is forked by Joinery from the original by OSSeed (https://github.com/osseed/com.osseed.eventcalendar) to support multiple calendars, until https://github.com/osseed/com.osseed.eventcalendar/issues/48 is resolved.
